answerText: density of states[10] If the particles have half integer spin, like electrons and muons, they follow this statistical distribution. It shares part of its name with the class name of the half integer spin particles.

question: Question: You have a statistically large collection of particles. Answer the following things about it for 10 points each: [10] Without knowing the types of particles, you can figure out this quantity for the system. This is the number of allowed states at each energy level.
